name: Developer Name
slogan: I build things for the web.
introduction: I m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I m focused on building accessible, human-centered products at Upstatement.

about.p4: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

ProjectContent: Write modern, performant, maintainable code for a diverse array of client and internal projects
Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Gatsby, React, Craft, WordPress, Prismic, and Netlify
Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis
Worked with a team of three designers to build a marketing website and e-commerce platform for blistabloc, an ambitious startup originating from Northeastern
Helped solidify a brand direction for blistabloc that spans both packaging and web
Interfaced with clients on a weekly basis, providing technological expertise
